metadata.description: At head of title: Société des amis de la liberté et de l'égalité, séante aux ci-devant Jacobins Saint-Honoré, `a Paris
The first text (p.[1]-5) is about two rival parties in the Convention nationale
"Pétition au département de la Gironde, par divers citoyens de Bordeaux": p.6-8. Dated: Bordeaux, le 6 novembre 1792, l'an 1er de la République
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on cover page. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
